cause.description:
Grayson needs a new drumset. The one he has right now is really old...the bass doesn't even have a back head...and the cymbal stands give out way to easily...and the cymbals suck...but the high-hat's pretty good.
ya...so donations are excepted ...pitty is required, only because it leads to donations
you can give your donations to me at my house, or at a show...if we get a gig, we'll let everyone know
1. Broken Traditions will sound even more amzing with a new drumset
2. Drumsets shouldn't be really old, unless they have been referbished...
3. Grayson deserves a new drumset
cause.name: Get Grayson A New Drumset
